website_summaries.verdict: For those who want that classic sledding experience, the Flexible Flyer both looks great and will get you and the kids downhill fast.
pros: Many parents may remember this sled's classic steel runner design from their own childhood, as it has classic looks and fast speeds going down snowy hills
60" – can be used by kids and adults
cons: Not ideal for small children, especially those age 5 and under

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a photo prop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a photography prop and it's just BEAUTIFUL! We're expecting 4 inches of snow in my area of Texas, so I could always update my review to how it works as a sled! I'm sure this type of sled works in some areas that are frozen solid on .5 of a year round basis. I grew up in Missouri, where we had snow at the most a week at a time and it definitely wouldn't have worked there, so it most certainly won't work here in Texas. Flat bottomed smooth sleds are best with quick snow in warmer climates. It makes a lovely photo prop though!

product_meta.title: Flexible Flyer Metal Runner Sled. Steel & Wood Steering Snow Slider
feature_bullets: Classic adult sled - the original Flexible Flyer steel runner sled. Large sled size lets both children and adults enjoy the thrill of winter sledding
Big - Big enough for a large. This Snow sled is easy to steer while holding a child in your lap
Steering - Carve turns with maximum control. Steer lying down with your hands, or in a seated position with your feet, or with a rope (not included) attached to the steering bar
